outputs.output_descr:
The proposed project will support three RC/RRs and UNDP-CO/UNCTs to undertake political risk analysis exercises based on locally relevant needs and methods; and will then work "back," using best practices, from these pilots to develop more coherent UNDP HQ support.

Output 1: Participatory risk analysis completed of the current political and conflict situation in at least three countries.
Output 2: UNDP and UNCT programmes and related actions made more conflict-sensitive.
Output 3: Lessons learned document on the three cases of risk analysis.

project_descr: Managing Political Risk to Development (MPRD) in the ECIS Region
